title: Violet the Organ Grinder: Lick It Up
description: Is everything bigger in Texas? The servin' size of thick n juicy southern meat sure is!Violet's insatiable appetite gets put to the test at a year-end BBQ. She's serving up dessert for 20+ hunky and chunky men on the ranch.Can Violet find the room to ingest more beef and still enjoy a delicious treat too?***Note*** This novella contains over 15,000 words and uses graphic language and explicit descriptions. This erotic tale is not for the prudish, the squeamish or the faint-of-heart. Intended for MATURE AUDIENCES only!
author: July Cumming
